text: Black Book () is a 2006 Dutch German Belgian British World War II drama movie directed by Paul Verhoeven and starring Carice van Houten, Sebastian Koch, Thom Hoffman, Derek de Lint, Dolf de Vries, Halina Reijn, Peter Blok, Waldemar Kobus. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2006 drama movies Category:2000s war movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:British war movies Category:British drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Verhoeven
title: Black Book (movie)
